message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product, which I know is worth at least $1,000,000 to you. I'm confident it can be a valuable asset for your business. To ensure a smooth transaction and a fair price, I'm willing to sell it to you for $999,999. This is a rare opportunity to acquire something of significant value at a very competitive price. Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.
